businessTrendLinks.description: 3d Printing as a value-added service co-located with a dispatch hub
Exploitation of APIs to create new businesses, services and distribution channels, e.g. Uber is built through APIs for payments, GPS and notifications
Existing Players in other industries - especially online retail - funded lateral migration into the Logistics market - especially the #last mile#
Driverless vehicles using sensors, analytics to travel safely from A to B
Seek to break open the traditional market with price optimised, highly automated and personalised services

businessTrends.name: Customer retention
businessTrends.description: Customer retention for customers via aggregators (proactive retention management)

businessTrends.name: Enterprise Logistics Platform as a Service
businessTrends.description: Enterprise Logistics Platform as a Service

businessTrends.name: Freight Aggregation and cost comparison sites
businessTrends.description: Freight Aggregation and cost comparison sites

businessTrends.name: Machine Learning
businessTrends.description: Machine Learning is an application of Artificial Intelligence (AI) that provides systems the ability to automatically learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed. Machine Learning focuses on the development of computer programs that can access data and use it learn for themselves.

businessTrendLinks.description: Site Advertising to allow individuals to take parcels in car/train or plane for a fee
e.g: Shipwire, characterised by how seamlessly it links services
Dynamically match shippers with consignees of shipping and transportation prices from freight forwarders. Facility exists to negotiate bulk rates as volumes grow through this model
usage of machine learning to improve the management of disruption and Force majeure
Master Data Management with AI and Predictive Insights
Multi-Characteristics tracking tag to protect high value or sensitive shipments (vibration, temperature, chemical contamination, package integrity)
Parcel Services analogous with its driver, passenger matching platform, Uber (and others Lfyt) will match shippers with car/van spaces in the marketplace
Maintain a balanced asset base along with standard industry KPIs ensuring customer retention, utilisation of assets with reduced margins
End to end services offering by partnering with co-packers, express parcel operators, collection centres including track and trace. Asset-less service provision.
Exploitation of base with incentives and offers
Stick to traditional models and work to ever decreasing margins whilst balancing asset replenishment/customer loyalty/prices with demand
The industry demands large amounts of assets and constant attention is made to how efficient the assets are used both on outbound and return journeys
